price: Tazama vipi wanavyo mzulia uwongo Mwenyezi Mungu, na haya yatosha kuwa dhambi iliyo dhaahiri.
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَۖ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦٓ إِثۡمٗا مُّبِينًا
footnotes: Vipi watu hawa wanavyo mzulia Mwenyezi Mungu uwongo kwa haya na mengineyo mfano wa haya! Yatosha uwovu ulio wazi kwa huu uwongo wao kuyakashifu maovu yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: unẓur kayfa yaftarūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba wakafā bihi ith'man mubīnan
